entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
